title: Nazma Shamima Laiju
summary: Nazma Shamima Laiju (Bengali: নাজমা শামীমা লাইজু) is a Awami League politician and the former Member of Bangladesh Parliament of women's reserved seat.
content:
Nazma Shamima Laiju (Bengali: নাজমা শামীমা লাইজু) is a Awami League politician and the former Member of Bangladesh Parliament of women's reserved seat.


== Career ==
Laiju was elected to parliament from women's reserved seat as an Awami League candidate in 1973.
